translations.gui.sload.failure.desc: Probably it has been damaged or deleted.
translations.gui.marker.title: New Event Marker
translations.gui.marker.name: Name
translations.gui.del.title: Deleteing session
translations.gui.del.desc: Selected session will be permanently lost!
translations.gui.export.name: File name
translations.gui.export.nodir: Unable to create directory for exported file.
translations.gui.export.fail.desc: Check the console output for detail.
translations.gui.extract.muldelim.desc: Try to select two or less
translations.gui.extract.nodelim.desc: Click a line with Shift down to select one or two.
translations.gui.extract.choend: Only one border has been specified, do you expect to save contents before or after it?
translations.gui.restore.failure.desc: Check the chatlog folder for detail if necessary.
translations.opt.visibleLineCount.desc: Overrides the maximum number of lines visible in chating HUD.
translations.opt.autoSaveIntervalInMs.desc: The interval between autosaves. Unused when realtimeChatlogSaving is enabled.
translations.opt.realtimeChatlogSaving.desc: Allow the chat log to be writted to the disk whenever possible. Enabling this option should has little impact on the performance as chat logs are saved on a separated thread. And it shouldn't be disabled due to some problems.
translations.opt.allowCorruptedChatlogs.desc: Allow loading damaged chat logs, especially those caused by game crashes.
translations.export.this.html.title: Chat log from %s (%s messages, recorded at %s)
